data.name: Dark Passenger - First Sight
data.detailed_description:
Dark Passenger- First Sight is the first additional content for the sadistic horror themed audio game, Dark Passenger.

Resulting from the feedback received from the game community, we found that less than 3% of the players actually managed to beat the game.

With this DLC, we have added a new feature that helps players struggling to beat the game.

Feature :

A map that can be activated once per level and appears 5 seconds to help players locked in a level.

To activate the map: Press space.

data.short_description: Dark Passenger- First Sight is the first additional content for the sadistic horror themed audio game, Dark Passenger. Resulting from the feedback received from the game community, this DLC adds a visual map that helps players to beat the game, allowing players that are struggling to have a better chance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 (2001) and above or AMD Processors after 2003
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics card that supports Direct X 9 or above.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X 9 sound device
